title: AWS Migration Project for E-Commerce
text: This project focuses on migrating e- commerce systems to AWS, optimizing for scalability and reliability, and includes streamlining the checkout process and data storage solutions.
cta: Implement a predictive maintenance system to forecast and prevent potential failures in electric vehicle components.

title: Finance Application CI/CD with Azure
text: This project emphasizes secure, efficient software delivery and incorporates automated testing for reliability.
cta: Aimed at automating the deployment cycle of a finance application.

title: Healthcare Data Management with Kubernetes
text: This project focuses on enhancing data handling efficiency, ensuring security compliance, and improving patient data accessibility.
cta: Deploying a Kubernetes solution for healthcare data

title: Educational Data Analytics on GCP
text: The project involves developing a GCP- based analytics platform for educational data, aimed at improving learning outcomes through data-driven insights and personalized content recommendations.
cta: Faster time-to-market for new drugs and significant cost savings in research and development.

title: Banking Cloud Security Enhancement
text: This project strengthens the banking cloud infrastructure by implementing advanced security protocols and real- time threat detection mechanisms to protect sensitive financial data.
cta: Implementing advanced security protocols and real- time threat detection mechanisms

title: Media Content Multi- Cloud Strategy
text: Focusing on optimizing content delivery, this project implements a multi-cloud strategy to enhance media streaming efficiency and global accessibility.
